Epstein Follow-up meeting
From NYM/Warden Secretary~ Charisma Edge, b(6); (b)(7)(C)
To b(6); (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2020/01/06 13:30
Subject: Epstein Follow-up meeting
Attachments: TEXT.htm
There will be an Epstein Follow-up meeting on Friday, January 10, 2020 at 12:00 pm in the WCR.
Be GREAT on purpose today!
b(6); (b)(7)(C) Warden Secretary
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
(p) 646-836-b(6); (b)(7)(C)
(f) 646-836-7751
